special_text:
Whenever you attack with two or more creatures, you may activate one of Mafua’s loyalty abilities.
[+1]: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.
[-1]: Exile target creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner’s control at the beginning of the next end step.
[-2]: Return target creature card with mana value
3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.
